com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.systems.monitoring
Class BaseProbeAction

java.lang.Object
  Action
      com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.RhnAction
          com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.systems.monitoring.BaseProbeAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseProbeCreateAction, BaseProbeEditAction, ProbeDeleteAction, ProbeDetailsAction, ProbeGraphAction
public class BaseProbeAction
extends RhnAction

Action for the probe details page. Note that there is no correpsonding SetupAction since there isn't really a good separation between setup and performing the action.

setParamValueList

protected static void setParamValueList(HttpServletRequest req,
                                        Probe probe,
                                        Command command,
                                        boolean submitted)
Get the parameter values for probe as a list of CommandParameterValue objects

Parameters:
probe - the probe from which parameter values should be taken; if it is null, the commands default values are used
command - the command whose parameters to list
submitted - whether the user submitted parameter values
